abstract: Adnan Syed, convicted killer at center of podcast Serial, which has raised questions about his guilt, seeks to add testimony of new witness in his request for new trial; is serving life sentence for murder of former girlfriend Hae Min Lee in Baltimore.
lead_paragraph: The convicted killer at the center of “Serial,” a popular podcast that raised questions about his guilt and whether he had a fair trial, will seek to call a witness who has never before testified.
snippet: The convicted killer at the center of “Serial,” a popular podcast that raised questions about his guilt and whether he had a fair trial, will seek to call a witness who has never before testified.
